and have a view that is amazingly breathtaking. the apartments are not only spacious from inside but also give you a spacious uncongested view of the outside.  location   this amazing modern architectural beauty is located in the most lavish and posh area of the fastest developing region of the ncr- gurgaon. it is located in dlf phase 5 in sector 42 of gurgaon on the golf course road. this makes it the best-located property as many schools, hospitals and metro station are located in its vicinity. apart from this, the view of the vast golf course from your apartment is so divine that it is sure to help you rewind from the stress of a long day.  feeling  the main thing when you are to make a decision as big as buying a house is the feel. dlf magnolias is one such housing option where you definitely get that positive feeling. the vastu and other aspects of balanced and comfortable living have been taken care of in these apartments from the very beginning. the great view of the aravali hills, serene and scenic beauty and the great lifestyle which are an integral part of these apartments are sure to get your attention and will compel you to make dlf magnolias your first choice.  why should you buy a magnolias place?  magnolia is a promise of quality and high end living for all those who have aspired for it and worked their way for it. many reasons will compel you to buy a magnolias place:  1. the basic amenities  the basic amenities like a lift in every building, 24*7 water supply, 24*7 power backup, fire fighting systems, car parking, intercom, gym, clubhouse and childrens play area have been provided to the inhabitants of the dlf magnolia.  2. other lifestyle enhancements   for health, fitness and entertainment  there is the provision of the golf course that is one of the finest in the ncr with dlf golf academy for the people who want to play it seriously, a multipurpose court, swimming pool and yoga and meditation centre. for entertainment and socializing, there is a multipurpose hall that can be used by the building occupants. the club house is big and a great place for social and business meetings.   eco-friendly environment  the environment in dlf magnolia is kept conducive for healthy living. there are landscaped gardens that give ample of fresh air for all the inhabitants. their compounds are paved so that there is no dust and other allergens.   other conveniences  security and water softener plant is there to help you out stay safe and healthy in all the ways possible  all this and much more is offered to the residents of dlf community, and this is the reason that the expatriate community, the foreigners, the embassy people and many such high profile people are part of the community.

golf drive communities countrys finest living.  set against the untrammeled beauty of two golf courses of dlf golf & country club, everything about the golf drive spells super-luxury. life here is designed to exceed the expectations of discerning residents. entry to golf drive is a welcome into a land of serenity.  a lush green, shaded road ensures a smooth drive amidst spectacular surroundings. this green mile is flanked by landscaped linear park the sanctuary, a 6.8-hectare masterpiece defined by multiple outdoor experiences, stone bridges and vibrant plant life.  the exclusive communities of golf drive the aralias and the magnolias- stand proudly as the most exquisite residences in dlf5. over the years, these super-luxury residences have set pioneering benchmarks in offering unparalleled amenities, gorgeous views and truly personalized services.  following in the footsteps of these legendary super-luxury communities is the latest offering   the camellias. this newest addition to this exclusive area the golf drive communities promises to take this experience to an even higher level, making a pride for its owners and also a slice of unparalleled luxury for those are looking to own it.  2. location advantage: dlf5, an unparalleled location.  dlf5 is the pinnacle of cosmopolitan living in the millennium city, gurugram.  the dlf community features numerous choices to live, work and play luxuriously.   at the heart of dlf5 is the dlf golf & country club with its two signature golf courses - one designed by arnold palmer and the other designed by gary player.   golf drive at dlf5 has the most renowned condominiums the aralias and the magnolias, comprising of a global and vibrant community.   spread over club drive, horizon drive, park drive and golf drive, dlf5 is home to more than 7500 families   some of the regions most prominent business powerhouses are located in dlf5, along with cutting-edge destinations for health care, quality education and community facilities in vicinity.   the south point mall which is just stone throw away, offers exciting shopping and dining options   horizon center complex houses the headquarters of top multinational corporations and some of the best restaurants of national capital region.   the newly completed raghvendra marg (erstwhile dlf golf course road) is a modern expressway of up to 16 lanes, makes international and domestic airports, just a few minutes drive away.   dlf5 is well connected with other parts of ncr via rapid metro system   gurugram-faridabad road provides an excellent connectivity with faridabad, reducing the travel time to approximately 30 minutes between the two.   24x7 monitoring - through cctv surveillance in public areas. supported by quick reaction security teams   a large central sewage treatment plant that caters to irrigation and some of the construction needs of the area, apart from supplying treated water for the flushing needs in most of the complexes an example of sustainable, eco-friendly maintenance    dlf5 houses one of two private fire stations set up by dlf. these are equipped with the most advanced fire-fighting equipment and manned by highly experienced personnel   project attributes: the camellias is the latest residential offering in dlfs acclaimed super-luxury portfolio. it assimilates stunning architecture, breath-taking landscape design and the learning from dlfs best developments across india to deliver a living experience far superior to anything experienced to date.  - designed by architect hafeez contractor, has bungalow-sized residences ranging from 687.48 sqm (approx.) on a single floor, with a dedicated elevator lobby for each apartment, to penthouses with area 1486.45 sqm (approx.).   - each home, handed over in bare-shell condition, can be designed to reflect the owners personal taste.   - dlf has appointed a team of the best international design consultants to set a new benchmark with the camellias.   - the construction of towers is now complete and fit-outs have been rolled-out sequentially.  the camellias  - the clubhouse, spread over two levels, under construction at the camellias will offer world class social, creative, health, wellness, food & beverage and entertainment facilities to cater to all the needs of the residents within the complex.

international city by sobha phase 1 in sector 109, gurgaon is a ready-to-move housing society. it offers apartments, independent floors and villas in varied budget range. these units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. there are 4bhk, 5bhk and 6bhk apartments, 4bhk independent floors and 3bhk, 4bhk, 5bhk and 7bhk villas available in this project. this housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. check out some of the features of international city by sobha phase 1 housing society:  *spread over an area of 36 acres, international city by sobha phase 1 is one of the spacious housing societies in the gurgaon region. with all the basic amenities available, international city by sobha phase 1 fits into your budget and your lifestyle.  *sector 109 has good connectivity to some of the important areas in the proximity such as the shikshiyan school, dharampeth main road and dwarka expressway and so on. its a very nice society with all the amenities available. almost all the online stores deliver here and other than that plenty of small shops have opened up in the adjoining areas.we also have two schools in the vicinity-euro international and gyaananda.columbia asia hospital is also nearby.one out of three shopping malls has been started. construction work of dwarka expressway is in full swing which will improve its connectivity further.we have a very strong rwa which has done so many good things for the benefit of the society.in days to come this society will be most sought after societies of sector 109. sobha international city - one of the best upcoming luxury communities for delhiites is the sobha international city, an exclusive villa community spread over 150-acres, and located within a stone throws distance of the indira gandhi international airport. the area is well-connected and will be even more so in the near future, thanks to the upcoming dwarka expressway and is theclosest villa community to new delhi. now you need not worry much about arriving here from south delhi, as sobha is a mere 25-minute drive from areas such as the shanti niketan, vasant vihar and west end. going to the workplace will also be a breeze, since it is within 30 minutes of gurgaon. sobha international city is located insectors 106, 108 and 109 of gurgaon potential buyers will be happy to know that more than 100 villas have already been completed & delivered as per the promised timelines under phase 1 of this project, spread over 36 acresin sector 109, gurgaon.phase 2, which is currently under construction and is spread across 43 acres of land, will have more than 160 villas adjacent to the under-construction dwarka expressway.similarly, phase 3 and 4 of the sobha international city will cover over 71 acres in sector 106 and 108, gurgaon. sobha international city has been planned as another example of the constructional prowess of thesobha (formerly sobha developers ltd.) group. this luxurious model of living, that focusses on top quality, is being developed asa blend of sophisticated urban living and modern space planning. it offers customers the chance to purchase luxury row houses and fancy presidential and duplex villas, while dwelling on a lush ecosystem that comprises of infrastructure such as well-planned roads, easily accessible shopping malls, local grocery shops, hospitals and schools
